name: Solitaire from PlaySimple
description:
Solitaire by PlaySimple also knows as Klondike Solitaire is the #1 card game app. Stay sharp with the BEST SOLITAIRE app, with personal leaderboard support and tons of fun features. Card games even feature beautiful graphics just like classic Solitaire you played on your computer.

Solitaire by PlaySimple features:

• Tap or Drag and drop to move a card
• Big and easy to see cards
• 1-card and 3-card draw Solitaire
• Unlimited hints
• Unlimited free solitaire games
• Track your personal stats
• Undo feature
• Auto complete
• Beautiful animations
• Sound that can be turned on/off
• Play offline
• And so much more!

Brain teasers don’t get any better than classic Solitaire! Patience and smarts are key in this card puzzle. Timed mode provides that extra challenge that an avid puzzle gamer wants.
